name: hyperliquid-risk-monitor
description: Mission-critical real-time risk monitoring system with automated alerts, circuit breakers, and emergency shutdown for live Hyperliquid trading by ae.ltd
features: Real-time position monitoring with portfolio health metrics
Automated risk limit enforcement and circuit breaker protection
Emergency shutdown procedures with one-click liquidation
Multi-channel alert system with SMS, email, and webhook notifications
Advanced portfolio analytics with VaR and stress testing
Integration with multi-agent trading systems for safety coordination
Comprehensive audit trails and compliance reporting
use_cases: Live trading risk management for Hyperliquid perpetual positions
Portfolio protection during extreme market volatility
Automated safety systems for algorithmic trading operations
Enterprise trading risk compliance and reporting
Emergency response coordination for trading crises

performance_metrics.alert_latency: Under 5 seconds for critical risk breaches

real_time_monitoring.position_tracking: Continuous monitoring of all live trading positions
real_time_monitoring.portfolio_exposure: Real-time calculation of correlated asset exposure
real_time_monitoring.margin_requirements: Live margin usage and liquidation price monitoring
real_time_monitoring.market_volatility: Real-time volatility tracking and threshold alerts

risk_enforcement.position_limits: Automated enforcement of risk_per_trade and position size limits
risk_enforcement.leverage_monitoring: Real-time leverage ratio monitoring and alerts
risk_enforcement.correlation_analysis: Correlated position exposure tracking and limits

circuit_breakers.position_losses: Single-position loss limits with automatic closure
circuit_breakers.correlation_limits: Correlation exposure circuit breakers with cooling periods

shutdown_procedures.one_click_liquidation: Immediate liquidation of all positions with single command
shutdown_procedures.gradual_unwinding: Market-optimized position closure to minimize slippage
shutdown_procedures.api_revocation: Automatic API key suspension and trading access termination
shutdown_procedures.stakeholder_notifications: Automated notifications to all designated contacts

alert_systems.sms_alerts: Critical risk breach notifications via SMS
alert_systems.email_notifications: Detailed risk reports via email with action recommendations
alert_systems.webhook_integrations: Real-time alerts to external monitoring systems
alert_systems.in_app_notifications: Live dashboard alerts with immediate action buttons

safety_protocols.redundant_data_sources: Position verification across multiple exchange endpoints
safety_protocols.manual_override: Human oversight requirements for critical risk decisions
safety_protocols.audit_trails: Complete logging of all risk management decisions and actions

portfolio_metrics.value_at_risk: VaR calculation at multiple confidence intervals (95%, 99%)
portfolio_metrics.expected_shortfall: Tail risk assessment for extreme market scenarios
portfolio_metrics.beta_calculation: Portfolio beta relative to market indices
portfolio_metrics.correlation_matrix: Asset correlation analysis and cluster identification
portfolio_metrics.stress_testing: Portfolio performance under extreme market conditions

performance_monitoring.drawdown_tracking: Maximum drawdown monitoring and recovery time analysis
